description.en:
Adds more rams. And explosives.

Anything you may want to ram with.

Also adds matching armours and shaping parts (slopes).

All products come in bronze, steel, and now copper and gold plated variants. Name plates included.

Supports the ram charge bonus mod that was merged in the dep pack.

According to some sources, the mines are now somewhat reliable now i tweaked them. Still, use at your own risk.


For the required speed, I recommend Turbofan Engines which can be found here :
 http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1198079954 


By YellowMiner
